data.message: Welcome President Barack Obama your the President rather people like it or not.They have to face the fact that your the President and there president of the united States of America. Opinions comments rather it be uplifting or negative it will not alter the fact that your in the white house.I love seeing all the comments especially the ones who are livid stay mad and deal with it.Even when he leaves the office he will still be called the president just remember that forever!!!! ;)
